title: Ghee
directions: Unwrap butter and place into a medium saucepan.
Heat the butter over medium heat until completely melted on medium head.
During this time, the butter will foam and boil twice.
When the second foam occurs, the ghee is done.
At this point, the butter will be separated into bright gold/light brown melted oil, foam, and crunchy milk solids.
Pour through a wire mesh strainer lined with 4-6 layers of cheesecloth into a mason or other glass storage jar with a lid, removing all but the clarified butter, or ghee.
DON’T STORE IN PLASTIC, especially since the ghee will be very hot. Discard the foam and crunchy milk solids and store in the fridge for up to 3 months.​
ingredients: 1 pound organic unsalted butter (grassfed is best)
